pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation for some Reliability Distributions // Parameters estimation and linear regression models for Reliability distributions families reviewed by Almalki Nadarajah (2014) doi:10.1016/j.ress.2013.11.010 using Generalized Additive Models for Location, Scale and Shape, aka GAMLSS by Rigby Stasinopoulos (2005) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9876.2005.00510.x.
